ProductInfo.Features:
The HP 650 can keep up with assignments on the run. The durable casing protects the notebook's matte charcoal finish so it looks as professional as you do.
Don't sacrifice display size for portability. Carry the HP 650 from meeting to meeting and enjoy the great view on the 15.6-inch diagonal HD display.
Develop stunning visuals without slowing down your notebook, thanks to Intel's integrated graphics.
Connect with colleagues and friends via the Internet and email at the office or your favorite hotspots with Wi-Fi CERTIFIED WLAN.
the Altec Lansing speaker brings you an extraordinary listening experience, too.
ProductInfo.Name: HP Essential 650 C6Z73UT 15.6" LED Notebook - Intel - Core i3 i3-3110M 2.4GHz - Charcoal
